thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Capitec Says Not Been Approached By Viceroy For Insight Into Business

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Capitec Says Not Been Approached By Viceroy For Insight Into Business
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - ‍Capitec Bank Holdings Limited:
* RECEIVED COPY OF VICEROY RESEARCH REPORT ON CAPITEC AT 10 AM THIS MORNING​‍
* CAPITEC NOT BEEN APPROACHED BY VICEROY FOR INSIGHT INTO BUSINESS AND NONE OF ALLEGATIONS DISCUSSED, TESTED OR VERIFIED WITH MANAGEMENT​
* “REPORT FILLED WITH FACTUAL ERRORS, MATERIAL OMISSIONS ON LEGAL PROCEEDINGS AGAINST CAPITEC AND OPINIONS NOT SUPPORTED BY ACCURATE INFO”
* ‍REVIEWING REPORT IN DETAIL AND WILL RESPOND TO IT IN DETAIL LATER ON JAN 30 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
